dataList.place: 11区 脑叶公司支部内某处
dataList.content: 长钉自地板上拖曳而过，熟悉的不祥之声再度在不远处响起。
……经理，容我僭越，我建议您最好尽快在作战条例中加入“确认敌人是否死亡”这一步骤。
一想到他又一次死而复生，我便觉得毛骨悚然。

dataList.title: 钉与锤
dataList.content: 异端之人……必须诛杀。
<你是什么时候……>
圭多走向我们的速度比之前更慢，但他的目光依旧牢牢锁死在我身上。

dataList.title: 钉与锤
dataList.content: 而……余下之人……应得净化。
我必须快点回拨时钟。
大半罪人都已非死即伤。
只凭毫无战斗力的我，以及连喘气都费劲的索德两人，根本没办法对付他。

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: 请停下来……
就在这时，索德从怀中掏出枪。
然后将枪口对准了我。

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: 请站在那里……别动……

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: 在你转动时钟的那一瞬间，我的枪……会先一步打穿你的头……

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: 别那样……看我……我听不懂你的话。但我可以告诉你为什么。

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: 他们答应……只要我跟他们合作除掉你……就让埃菲活着回来……

dataList.title: 钉与锤
dataList.content: 我浪费了太多时间……
吉多向前几步，一把掐住了我的脖子。
接着，他用另一只手紧紧抓住我的头，像是要把它捏碎。
我的脑袋咔嚓咔嚓地响个不停。
一想到他只要将手指按进去，我的脑袋就会彻底支离破碎，我就不由自主地感到恐惧。
就要这样结束吗？我就要这样死去吗？
如果……我是一名更称职的经理，一切会不会有所不同？
我还记得希斯克利夫曾吓唬我说，他真想知道要怎么才能打开我的脑袋，好让他看看里面装了什么。
真是不走运，希斯克利夫。
You’ll be missing out on a good show…
Thwack
I heard a sound.
It was the sound of something breaking.
Fortunately for me…

dataList.title: 钉与锤
dataList.content: Ngh…
It didn’t come from my head.
Huff, hoogh… Hahk.
圭多 staggers.
A nail was lodged in his back, and Sinclair was gasping for air behind him.
He was nearly unconscious, lying still until moments ago—it’s a miracle that he managed to get up and do this.
I could escape 圭多’s grasp thanks to him…
But 圭多 stood firm despite Sinclair’s desperate attack; he collected his breath and slowly turned around.

dataList.title: 钉与锤
dataList.content: …I see.

dataList.title: 钉与锤
dataList.content: You, too, are a filthy heretic…
You’re… all insane… out of your minds…

dataList.title: 钉与锤
dataList.content: The One Who Grips had once said…

dataList.title: 钉与锤
dataList.content: That you could have become the One as well.

dataList.title: 钉与锤
dataList.content: What a shame…

dataList.title: 钉与锤
dataList.content: You grip with the wrong direction.
<Sinclair… run away… I can’t… help you…>
No… I’m not running anymore.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: …I like that answer, Sinclair.
Gunfire filled my ears.
But the bullet struck 圭多’s head.

dataList.title: 钉与锤
dataList.content: You, who bring ruination upon yourselves…

dataList.title: 钉与锤
dataList.content: The Hammer shall continue to pursue you…
With those words…
圭多 fell to the floor, motionless.
And in that hush…
I heard her handgun drop to the floor.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Effie, he’s… he’s dead, isn’t he?

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: You’re all terrible liars. At least try to make it somewhat believable.
…C’mon 索德, let’s get out of here. You’ll be okay… Just gotta stop the bleeding, and… get you patched up.
Right. I’ll get a tourniquet…

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Don’t be stupid. I can hardly lift a finger.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Besides, those Inquisitors will keep on coming, won’t they? You guys need to keep moving down.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: I’ll hold them off here. You should go.
You can’t—You can’t do that…
You said yourself that you can hardly lift a finger. I can’t let you watch our backs when you’re in such a mess… Please?

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: You know… in moments like this… you’re supposed to just nod at me and be on your way.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Why do you care so much about the one who volunteered to stay behind?
You can’t… You can’t just…

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Aw… You’re making this pretty awkward, you know that? Here I thought I could have a cool farewell.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Faust, please take these absolute dorks out of here.
I’ll make sure to give Vergilius your regards.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: No need.

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: …Just tell him to come visit and say hello someday. You know what I mean?
Of course.
We headed for the next area, leaving 索德 to die.
We all stayed silent for a long while.
